settings.title: Google maps
How can I make a payment for my order with Elite Jacket?
settings.answer: You can make payments through Credit/Debit cards or you can pay through PayPal.

settings.title: Can I make changes to my order after it has been placed?
settings.answer: If your order has not been shipped, you can request changes by contacting our customer service team. They will assist you in modifying your order as needed.

settings.title: Where can I find information about the order I placed with Elite Jacket?
settings.answer: Upon placing your order, you will receive a comprehensive email confirmation containing all the details of your purchase. This email will include the price of each item, your order number, and shipping charges.

settings.title: Do you ship orders worldwide?
settings.answer: Elite Jacket proudly ships orders worldwide, except to Israel, Russia, and APO/FPO addresses. For any inquiries or further assistance regarding international shipping, you can reach out to us at support@elitejacket.com or chat with us via the messenger icon.

settings.title: Is ordering online from Elite Jacket secure?
settings.answer: At Elite Jacket, we prioritize the security and privacy of our customers. To ensure a safe online shopping experience, we utilize SSL (Secure Socket Layer) encryption, providing end-to-end protection. We also partner with PayPal, a highly secure and reliable payment service.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my Elite Jacket order?
settings.answer: We strive to deliver orders within 3-8 business days. In the event of any delays beyond the estimated timeframe, please contact our customer service team, and they will be glad to assist you.

settings.title: How will I know if Elite Jacket has received my order?
settings.answer: Upon successfully placing your order, you will receive an email confirmation from Elite Jacket within a few minutes. This email serves as proof that your order has been received.

settings.title: What should I do if I have troubles with my Elite Jacket order?
settings.answer: If you experience any problems with your order, please contact our dedicated Customer Service Team immediately. They will address your concerns promptly. For more information, please refer to our return and exchange policy page.

settings.title: How can I track my Elite Jacket order?
settings.answer: Once your Elite Jacket order is dispatched, you will receive an email notification containing the tracking details. You can also track your order directly on our website by visiting the designated tracking page.

settings.title: How can I cancel my Elite Jacket order?
settings.answer: Orders can be canceled prior to shipping. However, if the product has already been dispatched, you will need to receive it and then follow our return process for a refund or exchange.

settings.title: Can I exchange my Elite Jacket for a different item?
settings.answer: If you wish to exchange your Elite Jacket for another item from our store, please contact our customer service team for further assistance. They will guide you through the exchange process.

settings.title: Are the sizes of Elite Jacket jackets true to the size chart?
settings.answer: Are the sizes of Elite Jacket jackets true to the size chart?

settings.title: Do you offer custom-made sizes for Elite Jacket jackets?
settings.answer: Custom-made sizes are available for suits only at Elite Jacket.

settings.title: Are the sizes of Elite Jacket jackets in inches or centimeters?
settings.answer: For your convenience, Elite Jacket offers sizes in both inches and centimeters. You can refer to our comprehensive size guide to choose the appropriate size for your jacket.

settings.title: How can I use or enter my coupon code with Elite Jacket?
settings.answer: During the checkout process, you will find a coupon code field where you can enter your discount code. Apply the code to avail the offered discount.

settings.title: Do I need to pay for the return courier charges with Elite Jacket?
settings.answer: As Elite Jacket provides free shipping for orders, we are unable to cover the return courier charges. Customers are responsible for the shipping costs associated with returns.

settings.title: How will I receive my refunds in case of returns with Elite Jacket?
settings.answer: For returns, you will receive your refund through the original form of payment used during the purchase. Please note that refund processing times may take up to 6-7 business days.

settings.title: Which courier service does Elite Jacket use?
settings.answer: Elite Jacket utilizes the services of FedEx and DHL for express international shipping. Within the United States, we primarily use USPS and UPS for our deliveries.

settings.title: Does Elite Jacket have any physical retail stores?
settings.answer: Elite Jacket is an exclusive online leather jacket store. We do not operate any physical retail shops.

settings.title: Will I be charged customs fees with Elite Jacket?
settings.answer: To minimize customs fees, we label the items as gifts and declare a lower value price on the invoice. However, the application of customs fees depends on the specific rules and regulations of each country.

settings.title: How can I contact Elite Jacket if I have any further questions?
settings.answer: For any additional questions or inquiries, you can contact our Customer Care Department via email at support@elitejacket.com or chat with us using the messenger icon on our website. Our team will be happy to assist you.

settings.intro_des:
The 2020 story started over a coffee at one of our favourite cafes – Nooks in Randwick, Sydney in early 2013. Sitting there looking at all the mums, bubs, Shopify theme and prams we started thinking… Shopify theme and prams all look the same… black, maybe a little red here and there, very few had any colour or excitement. We thought – what alternatives are there for Australian mums and dads that a stroller that is functional, modern and at an affordable price? Most stroller brands come from the US or Europe but what about a local Australian brand?

We searched far and wide and everywhere in between and couldn’t find any options that were functional, modern, Australian owned and at an affordable price. Surprisingly, we couldn’t even find any Shopify theme or prams that were designed to comply with the latest Australian safety standards.
settings.chooseus_des:
2020 has always been a design company at heart. The Innovation Department, responsible for the development of new concepts and products and counting more than 70 employees to date, is the beating heart and the engine of the company.
The original Shopify theme, the 2020, breathes the legacy of 15 years of the design. Having evolved over time, the iconic all-in-one Shopify theme remains unsurpassed with regards to its defining functionalities.

Now all of our Shopify theme, including the 2020, share the same design principles: design and engineering, aesthetics and functionality, form and function, have come together seamlessly.
settings.chooseus_answer1: Quality has always been at the core of us, as we want our products to last whilst being used every day. To ensure the highest quality, we like to be in charge of the entire development and production process – from the first sketch to the final Shopify theme.
settings.chooseus_answer2: Quality has always been at the core of us, as we want our products to last whilst being used every day. To ensure the highest quality, we like to be in charge of the entire development and production process – from the first sketch to the final Shopify theme.
settings.chooseus_answer3: Quality has always been at the core of us, as we want our products to last whilst being used every day. To ensure the highest quality, we like to be in charge of the entire development and production process – from the first sketch to the final Shopify theme.
settings.chooseus_answer4: Quality has always been at the core of us, as we want our products to last whilst being used every day. To ensure the highest quality, we like to be in charge of the entire development and production process – from the first sketch to the final Shopify theme.
settings.team_des_1: Emma earned her BSS in Psychology and BSC in Management from Santa Clara University. She joined Us after 4+ years in venture.
settings.team_des_2: John is a proud graduate of Teachers College’s Instructional Design and Technology program and can usually be found gaming, reading
settings.team_des_3: Sarah earned her BSS in Psychology and BSC in Management from Santa Clara University. She joined Us after 4+ years in venture.
settings.team_des_4: William loves tackling the legal issues that arise as transforms education. He used to have hobbies like traveling. He joined Us after 4+ years in venture.
settings.action_des: Enjoy the feeling of freedom, that’s the feeling we want to capture when we design our products.

settings.code:
Why Choose Elite Jacket?

Unparalleled Quality
At Elite Jacket, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional quality. We meticulously source the finest materials, such as premium leather, wool, cotton, and more, to ensure that our products meet the highest standards. We pay close attention to every detail, including hardware like zippers and buttons, so that our apparel can reach its maximum potential.

400+

Sales on First Month

1 MILLION +

Web Pages Created by Users

500 K +

Customers Served Around The World

Affordable Pricing

We offer fashionable products for every budget. We use cutting-edge technology, skilled craftsmanship, and an efficient production process, we minimize costs and make our products at unbeatable prices. We believe that everyone should have access to premium jackets without breaking the bank.

Hassle-Free Returns

We strive to ensure that our customers are completely satisfied with their purchase. In the rare event that you want to return a product, we offer a 30-day easy return policy. We make the process hassle-free, allowing you to shop with confidence.

Exceptional Service

Our dedicated customer service representatives are here to assist you. We value your satisfaction and are committed to addressing any queries, concerns, or questions promptly. Count on our customer service team to provide seamless shopping experience.

Secure Transactions

Your security and privacy are of utmost importance to us. We use secure payment methods such as PayPal, which offers end-to-end encryption. Also make payments using your debit or credit card. With Elite Jacket, you can shop with confidence, knowing that your transactions are fully protected.

Fast Shipping

We understand the excitement of receiving your order promptly. That's why we prioritize fast shipping. With Elite Jacket, you can expect your product to be delivered within 6 to 8 days. We strive to ensure that you can enjoy your new jacket in no time.

Satisfied Customers

We have served thousands of customers who continue to choose Elite Jacket for their jacket needs. With a growing base of over 4100+ satisfied customers, you can trust in our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.

Exclusive Discounts

At Elite Jacket, we value our customers and their loyalty. As a token of our appreciation, we offer exclusive discounts to our existing customers on special events and occasions. Stay connected with us to enjoy these special offers.

Product Innovation

Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We listen to your needs and preferences, allowing us to create exclusive designs that are unique to Elite Jacket. With us, you can find jackets that are truly distinctive and unavailable elsewhere.

settings.code:
Our Story

Elite Jacket's story began in Dec, 2017, driven by our passion for leather and a desire to create something extraordinary. Two ambitious individuals embarked on an entrepreneurial adventure, recognizing the growing demand for stylish jackets inspired by celebrity fashion. With no roadmap or formal business credentials, we sold our first jacket online, and that initial success ignited our commitment to invest more time and effort into this new venture.

settings.title: Elite Jacket
settings.subtext: Elevate your style quotient with our iconic leather jackets, designed for the fearless fashion enthusiasts.

settings.code:
our legacy of making a meaningful impact

Experience Affordable Luxury Without Compromising On Quality Or Perfection - Our Elegant Leather Outfits For All.

settings.author: Rick. C
settings.quote: I highly recommend Elite Jacket for anyone looking for a high-quality leather jacket. I was impressed by the craftsmanship and the range of stylish options available. The customer service was excellen

settings.author: Andrew F
settings.quote: Elite Jacket delivers perfection! The quality, fit, and attention to detail are impeccable. I constantly receive compliments on my jacket. Thank you, Elite Jacket, for an outstanding product!

settings.author: Emily D
settings.quote: Luxurious leather, impeccable craftsmanship, and timeless style. I'm always impressed. A must-have for any fashion-forward individual!

settings.code:
Redefining Fashion With Unmatched Elegance & Unparalleled Craftsmanship

Welcome to Elite Jacket, where style meets elegance and leather jackets become a symbol of unmatched allure. As the ultimate destination for discerning fashion enthusiasts, we bring you a captivating fusion of creativity and craftsmanship, meticulously curated to elevate your fashion game to extraordinary heights.

Unleash your inner fashion icon with Elite Jacket, where timeless style takes center stage. Our collection goes beyond the ordinary, captivating hearts and turning heads with its everlasting charm. From the bustling streets of New York to the sun-kissed coastlines of California, our black leather jacket epitomize the perfect blend of modernity and timelessness. Immerse yourself in an unrivaled sartorial experience as you explore the essence of true luxury.

At Elite Jacket, our passion lies in crafting mens leather jacket that exude elegance, elevating your style to new heights. Each piece is a masterpiece, meticulously handcrafted using only the finest materials sourced from around the world. We celebrate individuality and self-expression, embracing the spirit of the modern maverick. Whether you're a fan of sleek and edgy designs, looking for jackets inspired by your favorite celebrities, or seeking attire that reflects the allure of your favorite video game characters, Elite Jacket has your desires covered.

We take pride in our commitment to quality, going beyond aesthetics to embrace sustainability. Our leathers are ethically sourced from environmentally conscious practices, ensuring that by choosing womens leather jacket, you support a brand that values the well-being of animals and the planet. Prepare to embark on a journey where each red leather jacket tells a story. From the adrenaline-fueled adventures of action movies to the thrilling exploits of beloved video games, our collection transports you into the realms of your on-screen heroes.

For the gaming aficionados, Elite Jacket unveils a dedicated realm of enchantment. Unleash your gaming spirit with our specially curated selection, inspired by the virtual worlds you hold dear. Movie enthusiasts will find an extensive array of renowned movie character jackets, captivating cosplay attire, and iconic pieces from beloved franchises like Batman, Star Wars, Captain America, Deadpool, and many more. Embrace the winter season with our Brown Leather Jacket Collection for men. Combining warmth, comfort, and elegance, these leather bomber jacket are meticulously designed to keep you cozy and fashion-forward even on the coldest days.

Elite Jacket is not just a brand; it's an experience. Indulge in the thrill of shopping for clothing, knowing that each piece has been carefully crafted to exceed your highest expectations. Our dedication to customer satisfaction drives us to offer a seamless online shopping experience, complete with exclusive deals and personalized assistance. As a brand that embraces innovation, Elite Jacket continually evolves to meet your needs. We are proud to offer customization services, ensuring that each leather jacket women becomes a unique embodiment of your style.

Elite Jacket - Redefining Fashion with Unmatched Elegance and Unparalleled Craftsmanship in the USA. Elevate your style, embrace the extraordinary, and make a statement that resonates with the bold and fearless. Step into a world where fashion reigns supreme, and let your motorcycle jacket tell your story.

settings.title: Imagine the next level of fashion

settings.heading: All Brands
settings.subheading: Promotions, new products and sales. Directly to your inbox.

settings.name: Grailasia
settings.story: The theme is very good, the after-sales service is very fast, and patiently help you solve the problem.

settings.name: Jessica
settings.story: The customer support after purchase have been great! We have been working together with the Apollo team and we are very satisfied with all the improvements achieved! And we are very happy with the results! Just check it out :) www.definitionshapewear.com Even thought, the Apollo team is 7 hours ahead of us, they have made the effort to catch up with us almost on a daily basis. A big thank you specially to Tuan!

settings.name: Pickett
settings.story:
Love this theme! The customer service is platinum level. I had many questions and needed help with multiple things since I am new to Shopify.
They always answered my questions very quickly and fixed many things for me that I could not figure out. They are awesome!
